description: A kitchen area within the Tower of Justice at Enies Lobby where Chopper battles CP9 member Kumadori. The room becomes the site of Monster Point's first appearance, with the rampage causing significant destruction to the kitchen and surrounding areas.

keyEvents.title: Kumadori Demonstrates Seimei Kikan
keyEvents.description: In the Tower of Justice kitchen, Kumadori showcases his Seimei Kikan abilities against Chopper, using hair manipulation and weight control techniques.
keyEvents.significance: The kitchen becomes the battleground where Kumadori's unique CP9 abilities are fully demonstrated.

keyEvents.title: Monster Point Debuts in the Kitchen
keyEvents.description: The Tower of Justice kitchen becomes the site of Chopper's Monster Point transformation, where he transforms into a massive, uncontrollable creature after consuming a third Rumble Ball.
keyEvents.significance: This location witnesses one of the most significant power revelations in the Enies Lobby arc - the debut of Monster Point.

keyEvents.title: Kumadori's Defeat
keyEvents.description: Monster Point Chopper brutally defeats Kumadori in the kitchen, repeatedly bashing the CP9 agent into the floor before carrying him to the balcony.
keyEvents.significance: Marks the end of one of the CP9 vs. Straw Hats battles, though the victory creates a new threat as Monster Point continues to rampage.

statusHistory.reason: Kitchen is operational at the start of the episode
Heavily damaged by Monster Point Chopper's rampage and the battle with Kumadori

description: The central tower structure at Enies Lobby where the CP9 agents make their stand against the Straw Hat Pirates. Multiple floors contain individual battle sites, including the kitchen where Chopper fights Kumadori.

keyEvents.title: Monster Point Loose in Tower of Justice
keyEvents.description: After defeating Kumadori, Monster Point Chopper continues to rampage through the Tower of Justice, creating a dangerous threat to everyone inside the building.
keyEvents.significance: Creates a crisis situation where the Straw Hats must deal with both CP9 enemies and their own out-of-control crewmate.

name.japanese: エニエス・ロビー広場

description: The main plaza at the front of Enies Lobby where much of the battle between the Straw Hats and World Government forces takes place.

keyEvents.title: Kumadori Thrown to the Plaza
keyEvents.description: Monster Point Chopper hurls the defeated Kumadori from the Tower of Justice balcony down to the plaza below, demonstrating his overwhelming strength.
keyEvents.significance: Shows that Monster Point's rampage extends beyond the immediate battle location, affecting the wider Enies Lobby area.

description: A winter island in Paradise where Chopper trained as a doctor under Dr. Kureha and Dr. Hiriluk. Referenced in flashbacks showing Dr. Kureha warning Chopper about the dangers of the third Rumble Ball.

keyEvents.title: Flashback to Kureha's Warning
keyEvents.description: A flashback to Drum Island shows Dr. Kureha warning Chopper about the catastrophic consequences of taking three Rumble Balls, explaining that it triggers 'the rampage of the Devil Fruit.'
keyEvents.significance: Provides essential context for Monster Point by showing that Chopper was explicitly warned about this forbidden transformation during his medical training.
